item.title: Circle CI
item.description: Concepts Workflows Workflows define a list of jobs and their run order. It is possible to run jobs concurrently, sequentially, on a schedule, or with a manual gate using an approval job. Jobs Jobs are a collection of Steps. All of the steps in the job are executed in a single unit which consumes a CircleCI container from your plan while itâ€™s running. Each job must declare an executor that is either docker, machine, windows or macos.
